{{Location Intro|description={{If Self|Forest of Blessings|It|Forest of Blessings}} is unlocked when first entering Simulanka during the {{Quest|The Story Begins in a Forest Without Rain}}.}}

The wildlife of the Forest of Blessings are made of {{w|origami}}. Known animal species include paper frogs, paper hamsters, paper alpacas, and paper flying squirrels.

==Points of Interest==
{{Locations by Category Table|type=Points of Interest}}

==Quests==
{{Quests by Category List|Forest of Blessings Quests|heo=1|not=}}

==Features==
===Exploration===
* [[Flying Squirrels' Aerial Adventure]] &mdash; a puzzle that let's the player control a flying squirrel to pass through flower garlands
* [[Grand Frog Chorus]] &mdash; control a frog and participate in a chorus of multiple frogs to obtain a reward 
* [[Move That Neck]] &mdash; a mechanism that allows the player to control the neck of a stationary paper alpaca
* [[Paper Leapfrogging]] &mdash; control a frog to jump from lilypad to lilypad to arrive at a destination

===Interactables===
====Scary Things====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the paper alpaca)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Why are those scary things still here...

;(Defeat the [[Large Hydro Slime]]s and the [[Tainted Hydro Phantasm]])
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Thank you! Please, take these!
:;(Obtain [[Bulle Fruit]] &times;3)
{{Dialogue End}}

====Treasure Chest====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the chest)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''{{Color|bz|Treasure chest, treasure chest,}} hide yourself well~''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''We're coming to find you, oh yes, we shall~''

;(Open the chest)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' Huh. You found me!
{{Dialogue End}}

====The Boss====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the paper hamster flanked by two paper alpacas)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''Cheepy cheepy cheep...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' ''The Boss means to say...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' ''Rewards await those who are kind to the forest.''
:;(A Fontaine [[Mora Chest]] appears)

;(Open the Mora Chest)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''Cheepy cheepy reep reep cheep...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' ''The Boss means to say...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' ''Let us meet again, should fate allow.''
{{Dialogue End}}

====Singing Hamster====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the "on stage" paper hamster)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Were it not to keep the flying squirrels' peace♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪I would no longer be lonely in the least♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Where does she come from, and where will she go?♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Why does she wear those lovely robes so♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Yellow Paper Frog:''' How moving!
:{{DIcon}} Applause!
:;(A Fontaine Mora Chest appears)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Were it not to keep the flying squirrels' peace♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪I would no longer be lonely in the least♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Where does she come from, and where will she go?♪''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ''♪Why does she wear those lovely robes so♪''
{{Dialogue End}}

====Trapped in a Barrel====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the barrel in front of the [[Hut of Blessings]])
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A & B:''' ...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' ''It's so dark...''
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' ''Wait! Who's blocked the exit!?''
:{{DIcon}} Knock knock...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' Phew... We finally made it out...
:;(A Fontaine Mora Chest appears)
{{Dialogue End}}

====Soaring in the Skies====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to the paper hamster near the central Kingdom of Breezes and Bells teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' Soaring in the skies... Ah, how nice.
:{{DIcon}} Shall I take you on a flight?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' But... Ah, no, no, I'm afraid of heights...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' I prefer my feet planted firmly on the ground...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' Thank you for your goodwill. Please, take this.
:;(A Fontaine Mora Chest appears)
{{Dialogue End}}

====Everyone's Moved Away====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to the squirrels south of the north Kingdom of Breezes and Bells teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel A:''' Everyone's moved away...
:{{DIcon}} What happened?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel B:''' A huge figure fell...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel B:''' All the houses collapsed...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Idle Dialogue===
====Rainsong Pond====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the hamsters near the chest)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ♪ Goodly treasure, treasure be good ♪
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster:''' ♪ Enter the chest just as you should ♪

;(A paper frog facing the lotus leaf next to a waterfall)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' O lotus leaves, so green and great~
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' Up they go, and down they skate~

;(A paper frog sitting at the base of the large waterfall in the south)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Green Paper Frog:''' Ribbit!
{{Dialogue End}}

====Kingdom of Breezes and Bells====
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(A flying squirrel on the path from the Hut of Blessings to the Kingdom of Breezes and Bells)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' I hear the Princess is looking for a Guardian...

;(A flying squirrel at the base of the big tree)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' Are you here to take the trials as well?

;(Flying squirrels at the top of the ramp to the big tree)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' This is a gift for our guests!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' You heard the Princess. Please, take it!

;(Flying squirrels near the central teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' What terrifying... footprints...

;(Flying squirrels in the tree west of the central teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' Safety first!

;(Flying squirrels northeast of the big tree)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' If we flew over there...

;(Flying squirrels on the tallest branches of the big tree)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel A:''' This would be the first place to be discovered...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel B:''' I hope it will not return...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel C:''' Safe... For now...

;(North of the north teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' The watch posts have collapsed...

;(Northwest of the north teleport waypoint)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' This place has collapsed as well...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel A:''' Terrifying...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Blue Toy Figure:''' We'll all put it back together later.
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel B:''' Everything's been overturned...
{{Dialogue End}}

==Puzzles==
===Kingdom of Breezes and Bells Time Trial Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(During the Time Trial Challenge)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Flying Squirrel:''' What huge wings!

;(During the Time Trial Challenge)
:;(The paper alpaca spawns a paper garland)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Uh... Huh...?
:;(The paper alpaca changes it into paper flower)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' ...Huh?
:;(The paper alpaca changes it into locked Exquisite Chest)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Calm down, there's no rush...
:;(The paper alpaca changes it into jump boost)
{{Dialogue End}}

===Grab the Berries===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to the paper alpaca)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Anyone want to play "grab the berries"?
:{{DIcon}} Let me try!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Each person gets 1 {{Color|bz|berry}}.
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' The snatching only starts when I say {{Color|bz|it does}}.
----
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Round and round the table stroll...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' Little berry, come to my bowl...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' {{Color|bz|Go!}}
:{{DIcon}} And another one!

;(If the player loses)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Almost there. Want to try again?
:{{DIcon}} Let's run that back!

;(If the player wins)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A & B:''' So fast!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' It worked!
----
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Want to move on to the next round?
:{{DIcon}} Let's continue!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' It'll be much harder next time!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Only by snatching the {{Color|bz|berry}}
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' can the prize be won
----
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Round and round the table stroll...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' Little berry, come to my bowl...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Ready, steady, ready...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Grab the {{Color|bz|berry!}}
:{{DIcon}} Grab the Berry!
:{{DIcon}} Grab the Bulle Fruit!
:{{DIcon}} Grab the Berry!
:{{DIcon}} Grab the Bulle Fruit!

;(If the player loses)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Almost there. Want to try again?
:{{DIcon|Gear}} Challenge Again

;(If the player wins)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' You're amazing!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' It worked!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' I failed to grab it again...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Congratulations on completing all the challenges!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Stolen Berries===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to the paper alpaca)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' My berries...
:{{DIcon}} What happened?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' Her berries were stolen.
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' We have to help her...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Come with me. To the cave!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster C:''' Careful now!

;(Follow the hamsters)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Stop. There's someone strange up ahead...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Sidle over quietly from the side...

;(Follow them to the hilichurls)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' We're busted!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' Help us, please!

;(Defeat the hilichurls)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' You're amazing!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' We should be cautious...

;(Follow the hamsters to the cave)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster A:''' So many enemies...
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' Could I ask you to help me?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster B:''' We'll head back and wait for you.
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster C:''' The berries are all in there.

;(Defeat the hilichurls)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster ?:''' Thank you for chasing those villains away!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster ?:''' Please return the Berries to that sad fellow by the river!

;(Approach the paper alpaca)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster ?:''' That kind soul helped us out!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Hamster ?:''' Amazing!
:{{DIcon|Hand}} Place
:;(Submit {{Item|Berry|x=3}} to comfort the victim)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Paper Alpaca:''' Thank you! Please, take these!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Capture the Squirrels===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to the squirrels)
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel A:''' Ready to take flight into the wind?
:{{DIcon}} Let me try!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel B:''' Victory's assured!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel A:''' Take up your position over here.
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel A:''' Let's catch up with the four contestants!
:{{DIcon}} Let's do it!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel C:''' Wait... Wait a moment!
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel A:''' Let's go!

;(Capture Squirrel C)
:{{DIcon}} Got... you?
:{{DIcon|Idle}} '''Squirrel C:''' Oh, I... got distracted.

;(Capture other squirrels)
:{{DIcon}} Gotcha!
{{Dialogue End}}
